title: Riot Support is useless...!
body:
Here is what happened:

I do not like my Summoner Name.When i was under level 30 i did not care about my summoner name,but now i actually do.I decided to change it,but i do not have 13 900 IP nor 1300 RP....

I had this weird problem with my Summoner name like it is not only that i do not like it,it also has my name in it.

So i sent a ticket to Riot Support,explaining the problem that i had and i hoped they would understand and help me.
I got a reply after about 5 hours by a Rioter names Mister Guns.
He replied that he understands my problem and he actually promised me that he would change my summoner name.But i had to do 2 things first: I had to take a screenshot of any sort of ID(so i can confirm it is me) and name at least 3 names for my Summoner Name.

I did that and i was so excited and actually surprised because i did not expect from a Rioter to ACTUALLY understands and help me.
I waited.... and waited.... and waited.... its been 5 days and still i got no response from him....

I replied again but this time another Rioter named Shaura replied back.
He/She/It clearly did not read my ticket and spoke about something else,like trying to change the subject....

I got so PISSED off that send a complaint ticket to Riot and still waiting for their response(they will probably ban me,idc anymore).

P.S: I know that i have to pay to change my Summoner name change,but when you ask a rioter for help and he offers a free summoner name change then never replies back,that is really greedy.We see you Riot,do not think we are stupid.
I would have even accepted a reply like:
Hey Summoner
We do not give a free summoner name change,go play games or buy with money
Good Luck in the Fields of JU$TICE!! 

FOR RIOT,FIELDS OF JUSTICE TRANSLATE TO: FIELDS OF MONEY...
